doc:
Mason Lee https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mason_Lee 0 Mason Lee (born May 30, 1990) is a Taiwanese-American actor. He is the son of three-time Academy Award-winning director Ang Lee, and Jane Lin, a microbiology researcher. He is best known for playing the role of Teddy in The Hangover Part II. Mason_Lee ( born May_30 , 1990 ) is a_Taiwanese-American_actor . He is the_son of three-time_Academy_Award-winning_director_Ang_Lee , and Jane_Lin , a_microbiology_researcher . He is_best_known for playing the_role of Teddy in The_Hangover_Part_II .
